summary: Comprehensive testing of Admin Panel Data & Archives, Analytics Settings, and Seed Test Data features completed. All 40 backend API tests passed. Frontend testing verified: Data & Archives page with all 6 tabs, Run Auto-Archive button, Analytics Settings with enable toggle and provider selection, Sold Items with full invoice details, Inquiries with Name Your Price tab showing product information.
passed_tests: Admin login with credentials postvibe/adm1npa$$word
Data & Archives page loads with all 6 tabs (Sold 30+, Inquiries 30+, Bookings 90+, Deleted Gallery, Deleted Products, All Deleted)
Run Auto-Archive button functionality
Analytics Settings page with enable toggle
Analytics provider selection (Google, Plausible, Fathom, Mixpanel, etc.)
Analytics test connection button (MOCKED - simulates success)
Data Collection Types toggles (browser, device, clicks, views, duration, interaction rate)
Sold Items page displays test sold items with invoice details
Sold item expandable cards show Invoice #, Date Sold/Paid, Payment Method, Price Breakdown
Sold item shows Buyer Information, Shipping Address, Auto Email Status
Sold item Tracking Details section with carrier and tracking number
Send Notes to Buyer functionality
Inquiries page with 4 tabs (Bookings, Product Inquiries, Sell Inquiries, Name Your Price)
Name Your Price tab shows test NYP inquiries with product information
NYP expandable cards show customer name, phone, product, offered price
NYP Product Information section with image, category, carat, color, listed price
/api/admin/seed-test-data endpoint creates product inquiry, sell inquiry, NYP inquiry, and sold item
/api/admin/data/archived/* endpoints (sold, inquiries, bookings, gallery, products, all)
/api/admin/data/archive/run endpoint executes auto-archive process
/api/admin/settings/test-analytics endpoint (MOCKED)
/api/admin/sold endpoint with invoice fields
/api/admin/sold/{id} PATCH for tracking updates
/api/admin/name-your-price-inquiries endpoint with product info
seed_data_creation: Test data seeded via /api/admin/seed-test-data - creates product inquiry, sell inquiry, NYP inquiry, and sold item with full invoice details
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new admin panel features are working correctly. Data & Archives page shows archived items by type with tabs. Archives are currently empty since items were just created (not 30+ days old yet). Analytics Settings has enable toggle and provider selection with MOCKED test connection. Sold Items page shows full invoice details with tracking and notes. Name Your Price tab in Inquiries shows product information with image and listed price.

mocked_apis.note: Analytics test connection endpoint is MOCKED - simulates successful connections for known providers (Google Analytics, Plausible, Fathom, Mixpanel, Amplitude, Heap, PostHog, Custom). Does not make real API calls to external services.
